SpecialCharacters.en-US: The following characters are not supported: &, <, >, \,",'

InvalidFormat.en-US: Format of email address is incorrect.

DuplicateSystemData.en-US: There is already an account associated with this email address.

Irrelevance.en-US: Gender and Salutation must be in agreement.

NotExist.en-US: Place of Work does not exist.

NoPermission.en-US: Some Place of Work are based on department of current user.

InPast.en-US: Activation Date is in the past.

InvalidFormat.en-US: Format of Activation Date must be dd/mm/yyyy.

InPast.en-US: Expiry Date is in the past.

InvalidFormat.en-US: Format of Expiry Date must be dd/mm/yyyy.

InvalidDateRange.en-US: Expiry Date must be after Activation Date.

Empty.en-US: Reason for User Account Request is empty.

OutOfLimit.en-US: Reason for User Account Request exceeds 1000 characters.

SpecialCharacters.en-US: The following characters are not supported: &, <, >, \,",'

InvalidFormat.en-US: System Role must be separated by semicolon.

NoPermission.en-US: Some System Roles are not authorised to be created by this current user.

InvalidFormat.en-US: Format of Personal Space Limitation must be integer. (e.g. 10).

OutOfLimit.en-US: Personal Space Limitation must be 10 when mass creating users.
